dct_title_s: F. DRAAKX Schip-Vaart door de Straat en ZUYD ZEE, gedaan om de gantsen AARD KLOOT
dct_description_sm: Issued in his: Naaukeurige versameling der gedenk-waardigste zee … . – Leide, 1707.
[1707], with (q) (top left) and Pag. 1. (top right). Issued in his: Cartes des itineraires & voiages modernes … . – A Leide, [1707].
[1714], with ornamental border. French title added to Dutch title. Issued in his: Atlas nouveau et curieux des plus celebres itineraires … . – a Leide, [1714]. Reissued in 1728.

California with one small bay on the northern part of the island. C. Mendocino, C. de Pinos, Nova Albion, and C. de S. Lucas labeled. The path of Sir Francis Drake is shown, with the track going as far north as C. Mendocino. Title on a carved stone. Vignette to the left shows a battle with an unfortunate man about to lose his life by beheading. Vytgevoerd te LEYDEN door PIETER VANDER Aa met Privilegie. (bottom left). F.Draak. (bottom right). Two scales (Germanic and Gallic) shown at bottom right.
